Posts.Content: Aug 28, 2008 02:46PM vision4utoo wrote: Best thing to do is get those mammo's and tests!  I had a itchy left nip, occassional shooting pain through and nip didn't stand well either - I then found a marble size lump - the doc found another pea size lump... Always get in and get your tests done andif doc thinks nothing of it get a second opinion from a breast doc!
